pages.text: $(li)The Guster Eye can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:weapons/pocket_sand)Pocket of Sand$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:redstone/alexsmobs/gustmaker)Gustmaker$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/guster)Gusters$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
